intro: Blepharostemma taurinum, commonly known as the Taurine Blepharostemma, is a perennial herb native to the mountainous regions of southern Europe and western Asia. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm, with lance-shaped leaves and clusters of blue to violet flowers that bloom in summer.
